page.title: 09BIRMINGHAM WORCESTER CANAL
page.content: On Monday 3rd.June class 3 went out to walk along Kings Norton canal to see the landscape.First we walked down to the canal.The first thing we noticed was the greenery. Our group went to the left.We saw boats moving and staying still.My group leader was Mrs.Legg.We saw different trees with blossom on most most of them.Also there was lots of blossom in the canal.Just in front of the bridge there is a sewage pipe and in the olden days there was a fire door on every bridge. On our walk we saw lots of boats and some of the people waved to us.If we looked up to the sky it was lovely and blue except for a few clouds.We got a good view of St.Nicholas Church.We saw some reeds and bulrushes,which were growing in the canal.They came upto my knees. By class 3 Broadmeadow J School.
